name: Smooth Operators 2 (itch)
description:
Smooth Operators 2 is a not-so-similar sequel to Smooth Operators.

This game is a design-based puzzle game in the spirit of Zachtronics or Human Resource machine.

It explores the basics of coding through machines that perform operations on the shapes fed into them, all set to a Jazz soundtrack. Hence 'Smooth Operators'.

The project will likely be in development for some time, as I feel out its potential.

In the meantime, here is it in partially developed form.
